column2: but worth every penny.  Some highlights for me were the Asian art
column3: they had an interesting modern Indian artist that had bright and thoughtful pieces sprinkled throughout the exhibit.  The collection of impressionist/post-impressionist art is massive - so if you like Monet
column8: then this is the spot for you.  Picasso is quite present as well.  There's also some space dedicated to Andy Warhol
